commands.name: az monitor app-insights component quotastatus show
commands.summary: Show daily data volume cap (quota) status for an Application Insights component.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component quotastatus show [--ids]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--resource-name]
                                                   [--subscription]
examples: az monitor app-insights component quotastatus show -g rg --resource-name name
